page.title: 19Housing
page.content: There is a variety of houses in the village from new bungalows to older terraced houses.Some of them are farm houses. Water supplies were provided to the houses about 100 years ago. In our house we have an open fire- place in the front room and a Parkray in the dining room with a boiler at the back for the hot water.We use an airing cupboard for drying damp clothes to make them warm and fresh. In the bathroom is a toilet, sink and bath. People did not used to have a bathroom and the toilet was at the end of the garden. We use our old toilet as a woodshed. The older houses were built with granite stones but the modern ones are built with brick or concrete blocks.
